definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: recount, rehearse (?) (Targum [[תַּנֵּי]], Syr. taniy, is recount, Ar. 3anay II, IV. is celebrate, but Heb. [[ת]] = Aram. [[ת]] = Ar. 3 is very dub.);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְתַנּוּ]] Ju Jdg 5:11 let them recount (Vrss) the victories of ´[[י]]:; Inf. cstr. [[תַּנּוֹת]] Jdg 11:40 to celebrate (mod.), or mourn (Vrss), c. [[ל]] pers.
